title: ranjitakavi
sahitya:
ranjita kavi kunjara gurunAthA aruL tA tA



anupallavi



konjiDum kiLi mozhiyAL vaLLi kunjari maNavALan mIdeLiyEn shollum manjari
atimanjuLamuravE vandaruL puri



caraNam



nin shol innishai nayamODum ishai nipuNarAm tyAgarAjan AdiyOr tam shol
innishai nayangaLum onru shEravE shentamizhil en sheyalinri Ishan sheyalAl dAsanEn
kumarEshan mIdinilnan sheyalE idenru nambi navilum Ezhishai nUlidu nalamura aruL
